jobDescription: Position: Business Analyst  Location: Austin, TX  Duration: 14 Months Description:The Client’s is currently in the process of developing an enterprise data warehouse along with longer-term data governance strategies, plans and processes.Client requires a Worker with solid experience in business process mapping, business process development and developing data governance and data quality plans.The Worker will interface with IT management, project sponsors, project teams and technical resources, to document, analyze and communicate system changes and downstream impacts of these changes.The Worker will be expected to work with both business and technical staff to assist Client in developing a comprehensive data governance strategy, and master data management (MDM) and data quality initiatives within the enterprise.Required Technical Skills12 years of Experience reviewing, analyzing, and evaluating business systems and user and stakeholder needs.10 years of Experience serving as a Business Analyst with projects that has successfully implemented information technology solutions.10 years of Experience facilitating and documenting business process mapping and business process reengineering.8 years of Experience documenting detailed requirements for information technology solutions especially business intelligence systems.8 years of Experience interfacing with multiple program areas or organizations that are geographically dispersed and that have varying business needs.8 years of Assisting organizations with creating and implementing data governance processes and plans.8 years of Experience with master data management, data quality assessments and data quality improvement.7 years of Facilitating discussions across groups, identifying, defining, and communicating MDM and Data Governance success factors to technical teams, and stakeholdersStrong Communication skills, both written and verbal.Strong Skills interfacing with agency management, IT management, project sponsors as well as technical teams.Strong Understanding of database technologies, data integrations technologies and data modeling.Strong Experience presenting to program and IT management, project sponsors, and executive leadership.Preference3 years of Experience working as a data steward or enterprise data steward. Thanks & Regards  Praveen- provided by Dice  Business Analysis, Business Intelligence, Master Data Management (MDM), Data Modeling, Data Governance
